forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High around 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
